definition: to spread out/to develop/to overflow/to amplify/superfluous
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing

sentences.english: When after the midday meal you sat at the window reading Ramayana.
sentences.chinese: 當你喫過中飯，坐在窗前讀《羅摩衍那》。

sentences.english: Burmese dancing costumes originate from the Indian story called "The Ramayana."
sentences.chinese: 來自緬甸舞蹈服裝被稱爲“羅摩衍那的印度故事。
